intro.description: Model validation and how to generate code from it.

item.title: Check validation
item.description: First the model state must be checked to make generation possible.
item.onCompletion: Now the model is valid and ready for further processing.

item.title: Execute the generator
item.description: Now the generator can be started.

subItem.title: Start by main menu
subItem.description: Start the generator in the main menu by File > Generate application. Or use the following link.
